scripts.install: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.dev:backend: cd ./backend && poetry run alembic upgrade head && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.dev:backend:pack: export LOG_LEVEL=debug && export WORKERS=2 && cd ./backend && poetry run alembic upgrade head && poetry run supervisord -c ./supervisord.conf
scripts.test:backend: cd ./backend && poetry run alembic upgrade head && poetry run pytest --cov
